class LoopControl[source]

from bfh_mt_hs2020_rl_basics.agent import Agent
from bfh_mt_hs2020_rl_basics.env import CarEnv

import torch

def basic_init_bridge() -> Bridge:
    env = CarEnv()
    agent = Agent(env, gamma=0.9, buffer_size=1000)
    bridge = Bridge(agent, torch.device("cpu"), gamma=0.9)
    
    return bridge
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def basic_init():
    bridge = basic_init_bridge()
    LoopControl(bridge, "dummy")
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
basic_init()
{% endraw %}
